meta.name: @walmart/wmreact-footer
meta.title: Footer
meta.description: A set of react components for Footer

examples.code:
<Footer
  copyrightText="B) Walmart Stores, Inc."
  emailSignup= {{showModal: false, loading: false, didInvalidate: false, emailId: ""}}
  referenceId="ASWEDF123W"
/>

<GlobalEmailSignup
  onEmailSubmitted={(emailId) => console.log(emailId)}
  showModal
  moduleData={
  {
    "type":"GlobalEmailSignup",
    "configs":{
       "campaignId":"1",
       "headerColor":"#888",
       "header":"Be the first to save!",
       "link": {
         "clickThrough": {
         "type": "url",
         "value": "http://www.walmart.com"
         },
       "linkText": "Privacy policy",
       "title": "Privacy policy",
       "uid": "6TTGai08"
       }
    },
    "moduleId":"640e8519-fda6-4bf3-aae5-caa0574ae15d"
  }
}/>

<GlobalFooterItems name="Walmart.com" links={
  [
    {
      "link": {
        "linkText": "About Walmart.com",
        "title": "Walmart credit card",
        "clickThrough": {
          "type": "url",
          "value": "http:\/\/help.walmart.com\/app\/answers\/detail\/a_id\/6"
        },
        "uid": "XfEg85uC"
      },
      "uid": "5uh7ZTD-"
    },
    {
      "link": {
        "linkText": "Terms of Use",
        "title": "Terms of use",
        "clickThrough": {
          "type": "url",
          "value": "http:\/\/help.walmart.com\/app\/answers\/detail\/a_id\/8"
        },
        "uid": "dKmHgWxk"
      },
      "image": {
        "assetName": "k2-_65ae56ce-e20a-4f67-8a4f-88fbc7f69cde.v1.jpg",

        "width": "86",
        "size": "100",
        "contentType": "image/jpeg",
        "alt": "footer image",
        "title": "footer image",
        "uid": "9ZKpMSLd"
      },
      "uid": "erj58MVs"
    }
  ]
} />
